biotools.summary: A program to estimate gene genealogies including multifurcations and/or reticulations (i.e. networks). The network estimation implemented is also known as Statistical Parsimony. A cladistic analysis of phenotypic associations with haplotypes inferred from restriction endonuclease mapping and DNA sequence data.

bioschemas.name: TCS
bioschemas.summary: A program to estimate gene genealogies including multifurcations and/or reticulations (i.e. networks). The network estimation implemented is also known as Statistical Parsimony. A cladistic analysis of phenotypic associations with haplotypes inferred from restriction endonuclease mapping and DNA sequence data.
